AddHandler fcgid-script .fcgi
RewriteEngine On
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
RewriteRule ^(.*)$ django.fcgi/$1 [QSA,L]


## blocking the IPs from China because lot of serious scamming waves wasting the server performance
order allow,deny
allow from all
